content: I find this to be giving the world a statement that our service members aren't capable to guard themselves. What makes you think that the Uganda people are going to do the job they are paid to do. Why are not Army, Marine, Air Force and Navy guarding their own bases? So we are now employing mercenaries. There is no other name that can be used to describe them. I find that this does'nt speak very highly of our capablities to protect ourselves.
reply: I find this to be giving the world a statement that our service members aren't capable to guard themselves. title: Foreign troops Guarding US Bases

content: Hey Sgt the back story helps. http://www.military.com/news/article/April-2009/securit...ml?col=1186032307786 I think this is what you are refering too. I understand your frustration as a former MP where force protection was one of our many functions. I can only imagine the rationale behind it is $$$.
